summary: This document is an email chain between prosecutors from the Manhattan District Attorney's Office and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing a new cooperating witness (CW) who has alleged sexual abuse by Leon Black and was trafficked by Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The emails coordinate a call to discuss the investigation and the status of another victim.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Subject of a sexual abuse investigation by the Manhattan District Attorney's Office. A new cooperating witness has alleged sexual abuse by him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who, along with Jeffrey Epstein, trafficked the new cooperating witness who is alleging abuse by Leon Black.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, trafficked the new cooperating witness who is alleging abuse by Leon Black.

connections.description: A new cooperating witness alleges sexual abuse by Leon Black and states she was trafficked by Maxwell and Epstein, indirectly connecting Black to Maxwell's trafficking network.
A new cooperating witness alleges sexual abuse by Leon Black and states she was trafficked by Epstein and Maxwell, indirectly connecting Black to Epstein's trafficking network.
Referenced together as the parties who trafficked the new cooperating witness.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Conclusion
events.description: The trial of Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced as having concluded, after which the Manhattan DA's Office follows up on their investigation into Leon Black.

events.title: New Cooperating Witness Comes Forward
events.description: A new cooperating witness (CW) comes forward alleging sexual abuse by Leon Black and states she was trafficked by Maxwell and Epstein.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007 (Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office)
keyFacts: A new cooperating witness (CW) has alleged sexual abuse by billionaire Leon Black.
This new CW states she was trafficked by Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
The Manhattan District Attorney's Office is investigating sexual assault allegations against Leon Black and is coordinating with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email chain reveals ongoing inter-agency communication about the investigation into Leon Black following the conclusion of the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The U.S. Attorney's Office indicates they are not likely to open another investigation unless the Manhattan DA's investigation encompasses both victims they discussed.
